mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, subTitle, content, boardType, created_date, user_id ) VALUES( #{title}, #{sub_title}, #{content}, #{board_type}, now(), #{user_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, subTitle = #{sub_title}, content = #{content}, boardType = #{board_type}, updated_date = now(), user_id = #{user_id} WHERE idx = #{idx}
